title: Canada’s Dictator Declares War On Freedom (Ep 1708)
description:
In this episode, I address the latest disturbing move by Dictator Trudeau against the truckers. It could have ramifications all over the world. 

News Picks:


Tow companies are in open rebellion against Dictator Trudeau.

Is Facebook working overtime to censor the truckers?

Is there a run on Canadian banks?


It’s been a year since we lost Rush Limbaugh.


Liberals will learn NOTHING from the San Francisco school board recall. 


Hillary Clinton is clearly concerned. 

Will Biden shut down the Spygate probe?

Decades of failed climate predictions.

Are we in for a massive real estate crash?

Wait, what? I agree with Ilhan Omar?
